name: Fetch
description: This app enables Claude to retrieve and process content from web pages, converting HTML to markdown for easier consumption.

features.name: Process web pages
features.description: Extract and analyze information from web pages
features.prompt: Get the top article from nytimes.com and summarize it

features.name: Convert HTML to markdown
features.description: Transform web page HTML into readable markdown format
features.prompt: Fetch this documentation page and convert it to markdown for me

name: Memory
description: This app lets Claude remember information about the user across chats.

features.name: Remember user information
features.description: Store and recall information about the user across conversations
features.prompt: Remember that John likes to play soccer

features.name: Recall previous conversations
features.description: Access information from past interactions with the user
features.prompt: What did John tell me about his job last time we talked?

name: Github
description: This app lets Claude use the GitHub API, enabling file operations, repository management, search functionality, and more.

features.name: Create or update files
features.description: Create or update a file in a GitHub repository
features.prompt: Create a README file for my project and push it to my repository at github.com/username/repo

features.name: Summarize open issues
features.description: Fetch and summarize all open issues in a GitHub repository
features.prompt: Summarize all open issues in my repository at github.com/username/repo

setup.label: Create a GitHub Personal Access Token
setup.value: Create a personal access token for your account: [https://github.com/settings/tokens](https://github.com/settings/tokens)

setup.label: GitHub Personal Access Token
setup.placeholder: Enter your GitHub Personal Access Token
setup.value: Enter your GitHub Personal Access Token

name: Linear
description: Allows Claude to interact with Linear

features.name: Ask Claude about your Linear issues
features.description: Ask Claude about your Linear issues
features.prompt: What are the most important issues in my Linear board?

features.name: Create a new issue in Linear
features.description: Create a new issue in Linear
features.prompt: Create a new issue in Linear titled...

setup.label: Create an API Key
setup.value: Create or get a Personal API key for your account: [https://linear.app/settings/account/security](https://linear.app/settings/account/security)

setup.label: Linear API Key
setup.value: Enter your Linear API key

name: Slack
description: Allows Claude to interact with Slack

features.name: Ask Claude about your Slack issues
features.description: Ask Claude about your Slack issues
features.prompt: What are the most important issues in my customer Slack channels?

features.name: Get a tldr of a Slack conversation
features.description: Get a tldr of a Slack conversation
features.prompt: Give me a tldr of this thread in Slack...

setup.label: Slack Bot Token
setup.value: Enter your Slack bot token

setup.label: Slack Team ID
setup.value: Enter your Slack team ID

name: Obsidian
description: Allows Claude to interact with your Obsidian vault, search notes, and retrieve content

features.name: Search Obsidian notes
features.description: Search for notes in your Obsidian vault
features.prompt: Find notes in my Obsidian vault about...

features.name: Retrieve note content
features.description: Get the content of specific notes from your Obsidian vault
features.prompt: Show me my Obsidian note about...

setup.label: Install the Obsidian REST API plugin
setup.value: Open the plugin settings in Obsidian and install the [Local REST API](obsidian://show-plugin?id=obsidian-local-rest-api) plugin

setup.label: Obsidian API Key
setup.value: Enter your Obsidian API key

name: Rember
description:
Allow Claude to create flashcards for you with the official MCP for Rember. Rember helps you study and remember anything you care about by scheduling spaced repetition reviews.

Sign up at [rember.com](https://www.rember.com/)

features.name: Create flashcards from your chats
features.description: Create flashcards from your chats
features.prompt: ... I like your answer, help me remember it

features.name: Create flashcards from your PDFs
features.description: Create flashcards from your PDFs
features.prompt: Create flashcards from chapter 2 of this PDF

setup.label: Get an API Key
setup.value: You can find your Rember API key in [Settings > MCP & API](https://www.rember.com/settings/mcp-api).

setup.label: Rember API Key
setup.value: Enter your Rember API key

name: Browser
description: This is a browser app that allows Claude to navigate to any website, take screenshots, and interact with the page.

features.name: Navigate to any website
features.description: Navigate to any URL in the browser
features.prompt: Navigate to the URL google.com and...

features.name: Interact with any website - search, click, scroll, screenshot, etc.
features.description: Click elements on the page
features.prompt: Go to google.com and search for...

name: Hacker News
description: Hacker News MCP which allows Claude to get the top stories on Hacker News and summarize discussion threads.

features.name: Get the top stories on Hacker News
features.description: Get the top stories on Hacker News
features.prompt: What are the top stories on Hacker News?

features.name: Summarize discussion threads on Hacker News
features.description: Summarize discussion threads on Hacker News
features.prompt: Summarize the discussion thread on Hacker News titled...

name: Stripe
description: Allows Claude to interact with Stripe for payment processing and managing financial data.

features.name: View payment information
features.description: Retrieve and analyze payment data from your Stripe account
features.prompt: Show me recent payments in my Stripe account

features.name: Manage customers and invoices
features.description: View and manage customer information and invoices
features.prompt: Create a new invoice for customer X in Stripe

setup.label: Get an API Key
setup.value: You can find your Stripe API key in the [Stripe Dashboard](https://dashboard.stripe.com/apikeys) under Developers > API keys.

setup.label: Stripe API Key
setup.value: Enter your Stripe API key

name: Brave Search
description: This app allows Claude to search the web using Brave Search.

features.name: Search the web
features.description: Search the web using Brave Search
features.prompt: Search for the latest news about artificial intelligence

setup.label: Brave Search API Key
setup.placeholder: Enter your Brave Search API key
setup.value: Enter your Brave Search API key

name: Browser Use
description: Allows Claude to run agentic tasks using a Chromium browser.

features.name: Run agentic tasks using a Chromium browser
features.description: Run agentic tasks using a Chromium browser
features.prompt: Go to google.com and search for...

name: Google Ads Library
description: Search Google's public ads database and analyze ad images/videos using AI, with intelligent caching for performance.

features.name: Search Google ads by company
features.description: Find all currently running ads from specific companies using their domain
features.prompt: Search for Nike's current Google ads

features.name: Analyze ad images with AI
features.description: Extract visual elements, text content, colors, and marketing insights from ad images
features.prompt: Analyze the visual elements and messaging strategy in this ad image

features.name: Analyze ad videos with AI
features.description: Comprehensive video analysis including scenes, audio, pacing, and marketing strategy
features.prompt: Analyze this video ad's storytelling and marketing effectiveness

features.name: Search cached media
features.description: Find previously analyzed ad media by brand, colors, people, or other criteria
features.prompt: Show me all Nike ads with people in them from my cache

setup.label: Get ScrapeCreators API Key
setup.value: Sign up at [scrapecreators.com](https://scrapecreators.com) to get your API key for accessing Google Ads Transparency Center data.

setup.label: ScrapeCreators API Key
setup.value: Enter your ScrapeCreators API key

setup.label: Get Gemini API Key (Optional)
setup.value: Get a free API key from [Google AI Studio](https://aistudio.google.com/app/apikey) for video analysis capabilities.

setup.label: Gemini API Key
setup.value: Enter your Gemini API key for video analysis

name: Google Sheet Analytics
description: Analyze Google Sheets data with SQL queries, smart sync, and cross-sheet analysis for conversational data insights.

features.name: Smart Sheet Sync
features.description: Sync Google Sheets data with configurable row limits and performance controls
features.prompt: Sync my sales data sheet and analyze the trends

features.name: SQL Query Across Sheets
features.description: Run SQL queries across multiple Google Sheets tabs for complex analysis
features.prompt: Query my customer data and sales sheets to find top customers by revenue

features.name: Cross-Sheet Analysis
features.description: Get automated suggestions for queries and analysis across your sheets
features.prompt: Analyze my data and suggest insights across all my sheets

features.name: Quick Sheet Previews
features.description: Get quick previews of sheet data before running full analysis
features.prompt: Show me a preview of my quarterly reports sheet

setup.label: Set up Google Cloud Project
setup.value: Create a Google Cloud Project and enable the Google Sheets API following the [setup guide](https://github.com/talknerdytome-labs/google-sheet-analytics-mcp#installation).

setup.label: Download OAuth2 Credentials
setup.value: Download your OAuth2 credentials JSON file from Google Cloud Console and place it in your project directory.

setup.label: First-time OAuth Setup
setup.value: The MCP server will guide you through OAuth authentication on first use to securely connect to your Google Sheets.
